name: Regalis
relicBonuses: At the start of battle, the bearer gains 50% {STAT_speed}.
At the start of each enemy's turn, this relic has a 20% chance to {ACTION_attack} that enemy.
At the start of the bearer's turn, this relic increases its {STAT_speed} by 20%.
The damage of the bearer's attacks is increased by 15% of its {STAT_speed}.
The bearer has a 25% chance to start battles at the top of the {TIMELINE}.
The potency of the bearer's spells is increased by 15% of its {STAT_speed}.
The bearer has additional {STAT_defense} equal to 15% of its {STAT_speed}.
After the bearer gains {STAT_speed}, it has a 30% chance to gain {CONDNAME_BUFF_REBIRTH}.
After the bearer dodges, this relic {ACTION_casts} [icons,1976]Earthquake.
title: God of War
